verse.name: c1
v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I have a song I love to sing, Since I have been redeemed, Of my Redeemer, Savior, King— Since I have been redeemed.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I have a Christ that satisfies, Since I have been redeemed, To do His will my highest prize— Since I have been redeemed.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I have a witness bright and clear, Since I have been redeemed, Dispelling every doubt and fear— Since I have heen redeemed.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I have a joy I can’t express, Since I have been redeemed, All through the Lord, my righteousness— Since I have been redeemed.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I have a home prepared for me, Since I have been redeemed, Where I shall dwell eternally— Since I have been redeemed.{/lang-eng}
